general.close_behavior_language_description: Choose the action when the close button is clicked.
general.auto_start_description: Set whether the app should launch automatically at system startup.
general.notification_description: Allow the app to show desktop notifications.
general.max_history_length_description: Set the maximum number of search history entries.

playback.audio_output_device_description: Select the default audio output device.
playback.play_error_description: Choose the action when a playback URL is not found.
playback.previous_track_behavior_description:
Set how the previous track button behaves based on the current track's progress. 
(The track restarts from the beginning after the specified time.)

lyric.enable_description: Lyrics search using Genius API, but accuracy is not guaranteed.
lyric.search_method_description:
Choose a search method for lyrics. 
1. Basic: Some songs may show translated lyrics instead of the original language. 
2. Advanced: Provides more accurate lyrics but may take longer than the basic search.

download.path_description: Choose where downloaded files will be saved.
download.concurrency_description: Set the maximum number of files to download simultaneously.

backup.backup_restore_description:
Back up or restore the playlist. 
Backups are saved in the download path and overwrite the existing playlist.
backup.clear_local_data_description: This will reset all local data. This action cannot be undone.

enableLocal.label: Enable In-App Shortcuts
enableLocal.description: Shortcuts that work only when the app is focused.

enableGlobal.label: Enable Global Shortcuts
enableGlobal.description:
Shortcuts that work system-wide, even when the app is in the background or other apps are in use. 
※ Be cautious as it may conflict with other app shortcuts.

shortcut.rule1: [Win, Command] are excluded from shortcuts as special keys.
shortcut.rule2: Modifier keys are [Ctrl, Alt, Option, Shift], other keys are regular keys.
shortcut.rule3: The order of keys doesn’t matter, but [Modifier + Regular Key] is recommended.
shortcut.rule4: Multiple modifier keys can be used, but only one regular key is allowed.
shortcut.rule5: Global shortcuts must include at least two modifier keys to prevent conflicts.
